rows.name: Vengeful
rows.description: You are blinded to reason. Reduce your Intelligence by 5.

rows.name: Rites of War
rows.description: You must take a full action before combat to recite the honourable terms of engagement. Until that is completed you take a -5 penalty to Weapon Skill.

rows.name: Calculating
rows.description: You see every other person as a potential threat. Take a -10 penalty to Fellowship when dealing with someone you meet for the first time.

rows.name: Righteous Fury
rows.description: You are driven to punish the wicked and uphold honour. When fighting an opponent who has harmed you or an ally, take a -10 penalty to Intelligence but gain a +10 bonus to both Strength and Willpower for the duration of the encounter.

rows.name: Myrmidia's Mien
rows.description: Your skin becomes bronzed. Gain 1d10/5 inches in height and gain a +10 bonus to Leadership tests.

rows.name: Piscine Charisma
rows.description: You become intensely attractive to fish. They greet you in open-mouthed wonder and shoal around you when you are in the water. For this reason, sea birds love you. You gain a +20 bonus to Charm Animal tests towards sea birds.

rows.name: Eagle's Friend
rows.description: You gain a +20 bonus to Charm Animal tests towards eagles.

rows.name: Eagle Eyes
rows.description: You have the keen eyes of an eagle. Gain +20 bonus to Perception tests involving sight.

rows.name: Fanatical Love
rows.description: You may select one ally who is displaying a symbol of Myrmidia in combat. For the round, that ally gains +10 bonus to all Willpower tests.

rows.name: Marked by Myrmidia
rows.description: A symbol of Myrmidia appears as a mark somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). You gain +10 bonus to Pray tests when using Miracles of Myrmidia, and +10 bonus to Fellowship tests when dealing with other followers of Myrmidia if they can see the mark.
